channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The US economy has suddenly been thrown into reverse as key GDP indicator flashes stunning negative forecast
item.description: The Atlanta Fed's GDP tracker now indicates the economy is headed for a 1.5% contraction in the first quarter, after showing 2.3% growth just days ear...

item.title: US to deploy nearly 3,000 additional troops to southern border
item.description: The additional troops will bring the total number of active-duty personnel there to around 9,000, the US military said Saturday.

item.title: Why stocks quickly recovered after Trump’s ‘World War III’ comments to Zelensky
Why Microsoft is killing off Skype and sending it to the tech graveyard
Thousands report outage affecting Microsoft services like Outlook
item.description: “We’ve identified a potential cause of impact and have reverted the suspected code to alleviate impact,” Microsoft said.

item.title: Sovereign wealth funds are back in vogue as ‘an extension of a country’s industrial policy’
item.description: Indonesia, the Philippines and the city of Hong Kong all recently launched new funds. Now Trump's U.S. wants one too.

item.title: China is ‘in a sweet spot’ as Trump’s shift away from allies deprives him of leverage over Beijing, analyst says
item.description: "Instead what we see, in the first month and a half of this new administration, the conflict is between the U.S. and its allies."

item.title: Worried over Social Security cuts? Start saving money, says former SSA director.
Zelensky: Ukraine ‘ready’ for minerals deal after Oval Office blowup with Trump
Stocks end sharply higher as investors shake off heated Trump-Zelensky exchange
